A B C D G H I J L P S T U

A

after() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.DataSourceDatabaseTesterRule
Invokes the IDatabaseTester.onTearDown() method.
after() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Rule
Ensures that the current H2 database is backed up and shut down properly.
after() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.JPARule
Rolls back any active EntityTransaction, closes any open EntityManager, sets all fields that were injected by the JPARule.before() method to null, and closes any EntityManagerFactory that was created by this JPARule.
apply(Statement, Description) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.DataSourceDatabaseTesterRule
Overrides the ExternalResource.apply(Statement, Description) method to store the supplied Description for usage by the before() method internally and returns the superclass' return value.
apply(Statement, Description) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Rule
Overrides the ExternalResource.apply(Statement, Description) method to store the supplied Description for usage by the H2Rule.getConnection(String, String) method internally and returns the superclass' return value.
apply(Statement, Description) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.JPARule
Overrides the ExternalResource.apply(Statement, Description) method to store the supplied Description for usage by the JPARule.before() method internally and returns the superclass' return value.

B

before() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.DataSourceDatabaseTesterRule
Finds an appropriate IDataSet for the affiliated DataSourceDatabaseTester and installs it immediately before invoking the IDatabaseTester.onSetup() method.
before() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Rule
Opens a new Connection to a thread-private H2 in-memory database and restores any state that was stored by the H2Rule.after() method.
before() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.JPARule
Creates an EntityManager and injects it into all fields in the test instance that are of type EntityManager and that are annotated with @PersistenceContext.
before() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.LiquiunitRule
Overrides the ExternalResource.before() method to acquire a Connection, find the proper Liquibase Database implementation, create a Liquibase instance and, using it, update the backing database using the affiliated changelog.

C

changeLogResourceExists() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.LiquiunitRule
Returns true if the changelog identified by the return value of the LiquiunitRule.getChangeLogResourceName() method actually exists.
close() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.JPARule
Forcibly closes any open EntityManagers and EntityManagerFactory instances, thus releasing resources.
com.edugility.liquiunit - package com.edugility.liquiunit
Provides classes and interfaces for setting up and tearing down Liquibase-managed databases during JUnit tests.
configureConnection(Connection) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Rule
Configures the supplied open Connection.
createLiquibase(Database) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.LiquiunitRule
Tries to load the classpath resource identifying a Liquibase changelog, and, if successful, creates a new Liquibase instance initialized to read from it, and returns it.

D

dataLock - Variable in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Archive
A ReadWriteLock used to protect access to the data stored as an archive of a given H2 database.
DataSourceDatabaseTesterRule - Class in com.edugility.liquiunit
An ExternalResource that wraps JUnit tests with a DataSourceDatabaseTester to ensure that the underlying database is populated appropriately with test data.

DriverManagerDataSource - Class in com.edugility.liquiunit
A general-purpose class that implements the DataSource interface in terms of DriverManager operations.
DriverManagerDataSource(String) - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquiunit.DriverManagerDataSource
Creates a new DriverManagerDataSource with no user name or password.
DriverManagerDataSource(String, String) - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquiunit.DriverManagerDataSource
Creates a new DriverManagerDataSource that will use the supplied username to obtain Connections, but no password.
DriverManagerDataSource(String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquiunit.DriverManagerDataSource
Creates a new DriverManagerDataSource that will use the supplied username and password to obtain Connections, but no password.

G

getChangeLogResourceName() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.LiquiunitRule
Returns the classpath resource name of the changelog that the associated Liquibase instance should use during its update operation.
getConnection() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.DriverManagerDataSource
Returns a newly-allocated Connection by invoking either the DriverManager.getConnection(String) or the DriverManagerDataSource.getConnection(String, String) method, depending on whether a non-null username was supplied to this DriverManagerDataSource's constructor.
getConnection(String, String) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.DriverManagerDataSource
Returns the return value of the DriverManager.getConnection(String, String, String) method.
getConnection() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Rule
Returns a new, open Connection to an in-memory H2 database that is safe for use by the current Thread.
getConnection(String, String) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Rule
Internally uses the DriverManager.getConnection(String, String, String) method to create a Connection to a new, in-memory H2 database that is safe for use by the current Thread, not just the current JVM.

getEntityManagerFactoryProperties() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.JPARule

getResourceAccessor() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.LiquiunitRule

getResourceAsStream(String) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.URLResourceAccessor
Treats the supplied name as a String representation of a URL, attempts to open a stream to it, and returns the resulting (open) InputStream.

H

H2Archive - Class in com.edugility.liquiunit
A special-purpose class that saves an in-memory H2 database as a String containing all the DML and DDL to reconstitute it.
H2Archive() - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Archive
Creates a new H2Archive.
H2Rule - Class in com.edugility.liquiunit
An ExternalResource that is also a DataSource for in-memory H2 Connections, with some additional special characteristics suited particularly for thread-safe, parallel in-memory unit testing.
H2Rule() - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Rule
Creates a new H2Rule with sa as the username and the empty string as the password and no initialization SQL.
H2Rule(String, String) - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Rule
Creates a new H2Rule.

Creates a new H2Rule.

Creates a new H2Rule.
H2Rule(String, String, String, H2Archive) - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Rule
Creates a new H2Rule.

I

isEmpty(Description) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Archive
Returns true if, for the supplied Description, this H2Archive is conceptually "empty"—devoid of archive data that could be loaded.

LiquiunitRule - Class in com.edugility.liquiunit

loadUnlessEmpty(Description, Connection) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Archive
Uses any stored DML or DDL commands this H2Archive encapsulates (saved earlier by the H2Archive.saveIfEmpty(Description, Connection) method) to populate the in-memory H2 database represented and attached to by the supplied Connection.
logger - Variable in class com.edugility.liquiunit.LiquiunitRule
The Logger to use for debugging and tracing purposes.

P

pid() - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Rule
Returns the current process identifier as a String.

S

saveIfEmpty(Description, Connection) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Archive
Provided that no archive data currently exists, atomically saves the state of the H2 database reachable via the supplied Connection as the newline-separated output of the H2 SCRIPT command.

shouldUpdate(Liquibase) - Method in class com.edugility.liquiunit.LiquiunitRule
Returns true if the supplied Liquibase instance should in fact have its Liquibase.update(String) method called.
